intro.name: Suheda Sener
paragraphs: I love creating things that make everyday life easier, especially when they start from a small idea and turn into a working solution.
I'm curious, practical, and enjoy building something visible and useful digitally.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Suheda, a curious developer and student who loves building things that start as simple thoughts and end up as useful digital tools that make life easier.
about.story: My interest in coding began when I switched from Metallurgical Engineering to IT and realized I could spend hours solving problems and building tools without noticing time pass. Since then, Iâ€™ve been on a journey to learn, build, and grow in the world of software development.
about.experience: I am currently studying Information Technology at Oulu University of Applied Sciences. During my studies, I took part in a cross-university Erasmus+ project in the Netherlands. Throughout my education, I have worked on several full-stack projects as part of coursework and personal interest.
about.techIntro: Technologies I've been working with recently include:

featured.label: Featured Project
featured.title: Halcyon Theme
featured.description: A minimal, dark blue theme for VS Code, Sublime Text, Atom, iTerm, and more. Available on Visual Studio Marketplace, Package Control, Atom Package Manager, and npm.
